description: Inspired by Mountain Hardwear's technical alpine wear but designed and styled for laid-back pursuits at lower elevation, the HiCamp™ Fleece Hoody pairs super-comfy, high-loft Sherpa fleece with a versatile and durable design that's ready for weekend after weekend after weekend of the good life. The three-piece hood adds insulation on chilly nights around the fire, zippered hand and chest pockets keep your essentials close and secure.
name: Mountain Hardwear HiCamp Fleece Full Zip Hoody - Mens
